opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Nassau County, New York v. Shain

opinion:
537 U.S. 1083

NASSAU COUNTY, NEW YORK, ET AL.
v.
SHAIN ET AL.

No. 02-541.

Supreme Court of United States.

December 9, 2002.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE SECOND CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 2d Cir. Motions of Corrections Captains' Association of City of New York and Correction Officers' Benevolent Association for leave to file briefs as amici curiae granted. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 273 F. 3d 56.
